subject: Your ATM Card of $7.5 million
body:
Your ATM Card of $7.5 million USD has been approved and was deposited
with DHL delivery company this morning for registration,and we agreed
up that the delivery of Your $7.5 Million USD ATM Package will take
off Monday morning .So c
ontact Dhl with your full info where your ATM
card will be delivered to you,
(1) Full name---------
(2) Mobile Number:--------------
(3) Direct telephone number ------
(4) Country of origin-------
(5) Your Current delivery address:
(6) Occupation:----
(7) City -------------------
(8) occupation _____________
Urgent get back to us today with your full address where your ATM card
will be delivered to because i will not be in the office next two weeks
:
The amount in your Card is $7.5Million.
The delivery fee and stamping duty is $155 usd will so try and send it to them
,
Regards,
Mr William Erick
From DHL courier delivery company
Email ( 
dhl5050@post.com
 )

subject: Re: Your ATM Card of $7.5 million
body:
Dear Mr. William Erick,

Thank you for your email regarding the ATM card. However, I must inform you that I am not expecting any such card and believe there may be a mistake. Could you please confirm the details of this transaction? 

Here are my details as requested:

Full name: John Doe
Mobile Number: +1-234-567-8901
Direct telephone number: +1-234-567-8902
Country of origin: United States
Current delivery address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA
Occupation: Software Engineer
City: Anytown

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: Your ATM Card of $7.5 million
body:
you need to pay the sum of $600 for delivery fee of your atm card before we can proceed.
